page_content: Document related to Betriebsanleitungen (operating instructions) for machines and devices in the context of food safety and animal health.

Details of an art exhibition titled "Als wir verschwanden. Vier Videoarbeiten" featuring video works that reflect on contemporary issues such as resource exploitation, refugee crises, and climate change.

Information about a seminar in Graub端nden for the training of Bloodhounds as search dogs, including details about the exercises, participants, and the use of Bloodhounds in police and rescue operations.
Information about an exhibition dedicated to Dieter Roth, showcasing his diverse and experimental printmaking work, including his use of unconventional materials and themes of self-reflection.
Announcement about new software for real estate capital gains tax declarations, detailing the features and navigation of the program.
Information about various events and activities for adults at the B端ndner Kunstmuseum Chur, including public tours, vernissages, and special lunchtime art experiences.
Announcement about the availability of electronic submission for income and wealth tax declarations in the Canton of Graub端nden using the Deklarationssoftware SofTax GR.

Information about an exhibition featuring the works of Hans Danuser, a pioneer of contemporary photography in Switzerland, including his contributions to the "reinvention of photography" as an artistic medium.

Discussion and proposal regarding the establishment of computer science schools (Informatikmittelschulen) in the Canton of Graub端nden, Switzerland, emphasizing the need for qualified IT professionals and considering the creation of a new IT campus.
